'''"Gate of Phantasm"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Gate of Phantasm" can be found at the [[Phantasmal Gate]] in [[Vanarana]] after completing the World Quest Series ''[[Aranyaka]]''.

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from the Phantasmal Gate in Vanarana.
